events.message: I received my order yesterday, but I want to return the product and get a full refund because it doesn't meet my expectations.
The issue was automatically categorized under Refund because the customer requested a return and refund.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for this customer.
Hello! My name is Sarah, and I’ll be helping you with your refund request today. Could you please provide your order number?
To process your return and refund quickly, may I have your order number and the reason for the return in more detail?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The product just isn’t what I expected based on the description on your website.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated the refund process and emailed you a prepaid shipping label to return the product at no cost.
Thank you for the quick response and for sending the shipping label. I appreciate your help in resolving this promptly.
We have received the returned product and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to make sure you received your refund and everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since we've resolved the issue and confirmed your satisfaction, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support!
